website_summaries.verdict: Plenty of bells and whistles – including GoPro compatibility – make this best-selling full-face mask the perfect companion to any diving adventure.
pros: Plenty of color choices for the fashion-conscious diver
Provides a much larger viewing area than some other face masks
Easier to talk and breathe underwater vs. traditional-style snorkel
GoPro mount can be adjusted for a perfect shot
cons: Should not be used for deeper dives
May not fit as snugly over facial hair

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend these masks
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend these masks to anyone! My husband and I purchased them for our trip to Hawaii. The first time I used mine I felt like I couldn’t get enough air in rough seas. The second snorkeling trip we did found my husband feeling nauseous and the pressure popped both his contacts out and a valve came out of the inside of his mask. Our experience is in line with reports about the potential dangers associated with these masks. I regret purchasing them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ourth

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS - ALMOST DROWNED
customer_reviews.text: EXPERIENCED CARBON DIOXIDE BUILDUP WHILE USING PRODUCT. Have snorkeled many times with a traditional mask & snorkel without problems. Using this product I found it hard to breath after a few minutes. Had to lift the mask for more air as well as clean the fog off the glass. Lack of oxygen left me tired and gasping for air. I had to rip off the mask and fight for my life. I was in DEEP TROUBLE. Just made it back to shore. I will never use this mask again. VERY DANGEROUS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Gurney

customer_reviews.title: About the same as the $12 one's at department stores.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product for an upcoming snorkeling trip. I opened the box, pulled my hair back and hopped in the swimming pool. Right away I noticed that I had to breathe extra forcefully to get air through the snorkel. Which is expected but it was a bit overwhelming. The other issue was that the snorkel mask leaked around the edges despite being sized correctly. The glass did not fog and the vision was clear but the water leaking was a deal breaker as the whole point is for it to keep the water out. I returned the item due to it not working, and ended up using my snorkel that just prevents water from entering.
customer_reviews.author: Trail dog in the desert

customer_reviews.title: New Version is DANGEROUS for Inexperienced Divers
customer_reviews.text: I own the older model and bought a new one for a recent trip... the old model has a rounded face while the new design has a flat visual aperture to improve clarity in the water, but it's so close to the breathing vent that if the mask is pressed tightly against your face, the valve flap can slide up and block the snorkel while you're trying to breath! I was able to use this mask because I could remain relaxed when I suddenly couldn't breathe, but my wife panicked every time it happened. I can see how someone could drown using this mask
customer_reviews.author: TheBjamin

customer_reviews.title: Never using the goggle/snorkel combo again.
customer_reviews.text: This mask is completely worth the money! I am never buying a different type of goggle/snorkel set again. My wife made fun of me when I was wearing the mask, but I could care less, it worked so well. I used it at Panama Beach FL. I ordered the large/extra large size. I have a short beard and didn't have any water leak in. The mask never fogged up. The only thing, which you just have to get used to, when the snorkel part goes under water, it immediately cuts off the air supply, which is a good thing, so you don't get a bunch of water. Its just a little surprising when this happens.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done but there are better masks out there.
customer_reviews.text: After doing a good amount of research, I purchased this mask along with the Aleoron full face snorkel mask. Both my husband and I found the Seaview 180 to feel cheaper than the Aleoron mask. The silicone around the face didn't feel as smooth and fit as nicely as the Aleoron mask, and the mask just felt like lesser quality. The Aleoron mask gave a wider, clearer panoramic view, and also filters UV rays and gives a polarized more colorful view underwater. I also had an easier time breathing with the Aleoron mask. So while the Seaview 180 mask will get the job done, the Aleoron mask, in my opinion is a more enjoyable mask to use.
customer_reviews.author: court89

customer_reviews.title: Needs an air diverter.
customer_reviews.text: It fits ok,m even with some facial hair. The tightened put a bit of pressure on the top-back of the head and restricts some blood flow (but I have kind of a big head, probably bigger than someone’s who’s reading this). What would have turned me away from buying this would be knowledge that inhaling pulls air across my eyes, dries them out, and makes contact lenses hurt like a sob (or I forego them, can’t wear glasses, and can’t see anything). I solved this by making a temporary diverter, but it should already exist on the product.
customer_reviews.author: Zizi

customer_reviews.title: WOW, outstanding customer service ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great. We order 2 for a vacation in Cancun. Very easy to use, the view is great. No water, no fogging. When we unpacked our luggage in Mexico,we notice the gopro attachment was damaged. Later in the week, I dropped the snorkel on the floor, and it came apart. Took a little work to put it back together, but it worked. A week later, I answered a survey from Wildhorse Outfitters. I mentioned the two issues, not really complaining, just providing feed back. To my surprise, they shipped me a new mask, stating they are serouis about making thing right. WOW, that is outstanding customer service, and a outstanding product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective or at least poorly made. Broke in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.text: Snorkel clip snapped and lost the snorkel piece the first day of our cruise. Definitely would not recommend this one. The other mask we purchased by Tribord was $30 less and worked great the whole trip.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy77

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for my husband. He loves snorkeling but he always complains about water filtration. He was so excited when this one arrived than he immediately went down to the pool to try it, but when he came back his disappointment was visible... He asked me to return it because despite all his efforts, he wasn’t able to keep the water out so I returned it same day. I don’t recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: YEM

customer_reviews.title: Great but get a folding down one
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about these modern day masks. I swam with turtles for over four hours and never once needed to worry about it fogging up or the straps. Highly comfortable. The only thing I would recommend is maybe getting one where the tube portion folds down as it's difficult to pack with it on and it seems as if this one will snap on me on day since it's not too easy to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: kdav99

customer_reviews.title: Safety Concern
customer_reviews.text: I have only ever provided a couple reviews in the past. I would not buy this product again nor encourage anyone to buy this product. I refuse to let my kids use it and will be disposing of the product immediately. I have another one if these (different brand) that we paid much less for which is far superior. This particular one is very difficult to inhale air out of in comparison and causes labored breathing and light headedness. I am having to replace this product with the same brand as my other one. Wasted $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Cobb

customer_reviews.title: It’s like the seal didn’t fit my dad or something
customer_reviews.text: It leaked from the top so I’m returning it. It’s like the seal didn’t fit my dad or something. It had a huge gap at the top because it’s heavy & when I bent down to put my face in the water it would fall forward a little creating a gap.
customer_reviews.author: paulette peros

customer_reviews.title: This mask gives the wearer an amazing view.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would give this a try. I'm tired of the old mask and snorkel combination. I wondered if this would be as good as it sounds. It does work as good as advertised, but a couple of caveats to buyers. Be sure to order the correct size, it does make a difference in how well the mask will seal. I bought the larger size and have a slight drip. The wife cannot wear it all. Also, I was surprised that the straps were an elastic cloth instead of rubber. I don't know how that will wear over time in salt water immersions. Lastly, I wish the snorkel was slightly longer. You have to stay right on the surface.
customer_reviews.author: zookeeper34

customer_reviews.title: Finally...
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY, a snorkel I can use. I lived in the Caribbean for a few years and tried to snorkel numerous times. I would always accidentally blow out through my nose and break the seal causing salt water to rush into my mask and up my nose. Ruined the experience every time. Then I saw this Seaview 180 mask advertised on Facebook. Checked out the reviews on Amazon which were great. Watched videos on people using it on YouTube. Then finally bought one for myself. LOVE it. Works perfectly. Even bought another one (pink) for my wife and she loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Faubel

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Snorkel Mask!!  Amazingly wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! I purchased one for my husband and one for myself for our latest trip to Nassau. What you can see with these masks on is phenomenal! We love to snorkel, and we have the old style face and mouthpiece snorkel but have seen this new style on our recent travels. My old mask left marks on my face for hours, this one did not!! It is so easy to use, you forget that you are even breathing underwater. My husband was informed by the company that his facial beard might have some leakage, but it was minimal. People on the beach were asking where they could get a mask like this. And the customer service is beyond wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to breath in.
customer_reviews.text: We found these to be very difficult to breath in. The fresh air tube up the middle is quite small. My husband has asthma and had a hard time in them, I tend to get a little panicky so I just stay in about 15' deep water...the labored breathing didn't help that :( Nice design, good fit to face, view is great compared to traditional snorkel masks and we liked the ball that floats to the top of the tube to close off the breathing tube if you go underwater, but if you have a hard time breathing...this might not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Finn fam

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough great things about this mask! I purchased 5 of these masks for my entire family and I as we travel to places where we can snorkel about once a year. I won’t lie, you look like a huge nerd when you first put these on but it is so worth it! With the traditional mask I would always suck in salt water which just set a bad tone to the snorkel trip. But with this make, my mouth doesn’t even touch the water. It does say anti fog and I have found that this is mostly true. All in all, I truly love this mask and so does my family. 100% worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Mask fogs very easily. I use toothpaste on the lens and usually ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiancé. We took it to the Bahamas. Mask fogs very easily. I use toothpaste on the lens and usually get through the hole day with regular masks without fogging up but this started to fog after about an 20 min. Cumbersome. After 20 min of heavy swimming I felt as though I was not getting enough air. I felt as though I was suffocating and breathing became labored. It does not seem like enough air enters the device. Mask is not as easy to get off in emergency situations as a traditional mask.. Great overall concept and works wonders for the inexperienced but wasted money for me. You can decompress without holding your nose.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Breath - Neither me nor my son - Broken?
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this mask for our Pompano Beach trip 4/27-5/6/27. The first time I tried it I wasn't getting enough air. I tried it again and the same thing, I couldn't breath heavy enough to get air. So my 27 year old son tried it several times and had the same issue. Maybe I got a defective mask or maybe the design doesn't work for me??? I'm extremely disappointed. I purchased it a month before the trip but now I find I can't return it. Very unfair since I couldn't test it in NJ where I live and now I have this expensive junk. Beware :-(
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: This was a poor product for serious snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: This was a poor product for serious snorkeling. I felt that every breath was labored and that I eventually became clausterphobic when swimming hard. It was great for keeping the water out and gave a great view, but was dismal when trying to go down even 4 feet beneath the surface. Too much pressure on the face and the mask was too buyant to push down towards the cool sights just under the surface. This would work great for kids who just like to skim the surface and put their face in the water.
customer_reviews.author: FacePalmer

customer_reviews.title: The masks themselves are pretty cool and would be great for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: The masks themselves are pretty cool and would be great for snorkeling, except for how cheap and thin the plastic is around the snorkel portion. Before our trip to Florida we took them to the pool. They worked great, or so it seemed. We swam around the surface and then near the bottom, which is only 5' 6'' deep. When we got out of the pool, we noticed several cracks around the base of the snorkel arm itself. Neither mask was dropped or handled with anything but care.
customer_reviews.author: edkruzel

customer_reviews.title: See View
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent prodruce, fits great, easy to snug head straps for perfect fit. Visibility is also excellent, wider view then my standard pair of wide angle goggles. The snorkel was easy to slide on and attached securely. Breathing was easy and when going under water it automatically secures without leaking into mask. It also has an attachment for mounting a GoPro camera, real handy. Fogging was minimal using anti fog helps. Have not gone deeper to check on pressure at depth, but I don't see a problem. Breathing normal was a lot better than breathing with a snorkel in your mouth. I would recommend this product to my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin K. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Seaview rocks!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I purchased this product!!!! It was life changing underwater! There are no words! I attached the go pro and saw the underworld! GET THIS PRODUCT! I am not a snorkeler, but now, I feel like I am. It looks weird... I joked about it too, but it is so amazing. But honestly I trust this brand. I purchased the Seaview brand and 1 cheaper version... The cheaper one almost drowned my boyfriend. This one kept the water out and I was just able to focus on having fun... not focused on how to keep water out.
customer_reviews.author: Syd D

customer_reviews.title: Changed snorkeling forever for me
customer_reviews.text: I never was thrilled about snorkeling: a leaky mask, difficulty getting myself to breathe through my mouth, or a wave going over my snorkel right as I am inhaling, made it a pain. This mask fixes all of that. If the mask leaks a little, or water gets in through the snorkel, it collects down by the chin, and clearing it just involves lifting your head from the water and exhaling. Since the air intake comes across the mask before inhaling, a little water from a rogue wave goes right by instead of down my throat. A ball valve atop the snorkel keeps most water out though. I now love snorkeling and can't wait to go again!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Snorkel
customer_reviews.text: In less than a month I'll be heading to Jamaica and I'm told the snorkeling at the resort we're staying is outstanding. I have the typical mouth piece snorkels but wanted something that might make the experience more enjoyable. I am impressed by the craftsmanship and quality of the snorkel. Of course, I haven't used it in Jamaica yet, but I did try it out in my pool. I found it to be a bit more difficult to breathe through than a mouth piece snorkel but overall am still excited to try it out next month!
customer_reviews.author: Contemporary Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Seaview 180 masks
customer_reviews.text: Just used these masks in Tonga snorkeling the reefs and they were outstanding. It took a couple of sessions to get our heads around how to use them and once we did they worked a treat. I also managed a number of dives to around 3 metres without any issues at all. They did fog up but not to the extent it hampered view at all. It was really strange at the start being able to breath through both your mouth and nose and that's what attracted me to them as of late l've struggles with using the conventional snorkel. They suit us as we are a couple in our late 50's early 60's and snorkel for leisure.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Nice mask but oh that label glue!
customer_reviews.text: There is clear label on the lense of this mask that when removed left a tacky glue. I was not happy, but somehow I was able to remove some of the glue with some almost hot water and soft cloth. I’m happy with the fit and use of the mask on my trip. I tried the mask in a pool and adjusted tighter. Easy to learn mask.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Rafferty

customer_reviews.title: I did not like this product!
customer_reviews.text: This mask is not great for snorkeling. For starters, there are too many pressure points on your face, causing pain with prolonged use. You cannot equalize, so its only good for surface snorkeling. Even a 6 foot dive will cause issues. If you turn your head left or right, water will enter the mask. Breathing is not bad, but also not as good as a traditional snorkel. I was so looking forward to using this mask, but it ruined our snorkeling in Jamaica. Save your money, or just go with traditional equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better visibility, works well in surf, and does not fog!
customer_reviews.text: I already had the adult sized Seaview and bought this for my preteen son before a beach vacation. He absolutely loved it and even my wife kept using it. We were surprised how well it works in surf. Unlike a conventional snorkel this one automatically closes when it submerges so you can easily snorkel in choppy water or in the surf. Also because the air flows through the mask it does not fog up like a regular mask. These two benefits were nice surprises beyond the better visibility from the larger mask.
customer_reviews.author: W. Dan Marks

customer_reviews.title: So easy to breath!!
customer_reviews.text: Went snorkeling in Aruba to try out my new purchase. Very little water seepage after I got rid of much of my beard. No fogging to speak of. Very important to avoid vigorous swimming. Breathing too heavily results in feeling that you are unable to get enough air. Steady breathing in through the nose and exhaling by mouth worked very well. As indicated, this mask is not made for free diving. The GoPro mount works well. Overall, many of my fellow voyagers were intrigued by the mask and were interested in trying one out!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Arcangeli

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough good things about this mask
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this mask! My husband and I used them last Feb in Jamaica, and we'll be using them next week in the Bahamas. The mask is amazingly clear and surprising comfortable to wear! We used Jaws spit before diving, and never experienced any fogging at all:. Granted you feel a little silly looking when you first put them on - although they were a great conversation piece on the boat rides ;) However, once you get under the water, and realize how clear and easy it is to see everything, they're totally worth it. My husband used the GoPro attachment on his, and was able to capture some great video.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. If you don't like messing with your mouth piece and getting saltwater in your mouth this is great! Im definitely a novice and had several miserable touristy trips using cheap masks. The cost of this mask is a small price to pay to actually enjoy your snorkeling trip! Used to snorkel twice sofar and I will definitely make room for this in my bag on every trip now! At one point I did get some water in the mask. Due to the great seal the water stayed in the mask but never seemed to get in my mouth, it remained near my chin if upright or close to the glass if horizontal.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Swimmer’s best friend
customer_reviews.text: Just used my mask for the first time today & I LOVE IT!! I got a large pink one, fits great & looks cute! A little bit of water was going into the mask as I swam, mostly down by my chin, but it never got in my mouth or my eyes. I swim laps & cant stand normal goggles. They dig into my under eyes & have started to leave a perminant indent. Couldn’t have that happening, but I also can’t give up summing. This face mask is the answer I have been looking for! You will not be sorry for buying these masks! And no, I haven’t gotten paid to say this. I just love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: These Are Fun
customer_reviews.text: While they are not for diving, these Snorkel masks are a lot of fun. It's nice to be able to breath through your mouth normally while floating on the surface, peering down into the blue waters below. I don't have a Go Pro, so I can't comment on that functionality. This particular size is very good for kids or adults with small heads. Otherwise go for the medium and/or consult the sizing charts.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: No experience needed & no learning curve!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd try one of these when I finally needed to replace my mask & snorkle. Wow! In addition to great field of vision, you don't have to think about breathing, clearing your snorkle, or ANYTHING. Just swim around & enjoy looking at things. The snorkle will automatically close briefly when a wave goes over your head & immediately opens as soon as it passes. No more inhaled water or blowing water out of the snorkle. Breath normally & enjoy the scenery!
customer_reviews.author: Kailani50

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for a few reasons.
customer_reviews.text: 2 major reasons why l like this mask. 1. It allowed me to completely get rid of the phobia of feeling like I am suffocating with a regular snorkel (seems like I am not the only one like that). 2. I use it just for swimming because it allows me to concentrate on the moves instead of worrying about taking breaths. Especially when I do butterfly. 1 minor reason - it looks cool. Keep in mind that this mask is designed mostly for surface snorkeling. I not a pro and I was able to dive in this mask approximately 6-7 feet with no problems. After few adjustment it became pretty tight and wasn't leaking much.
customer_reviews.author: bmi_3535

customer_reviews.title: Great design with no fog but the breath tubes are ...
customer_reviews.text: Great design with no fog but the breath tubes are not large enough for me. I'm a big guy and I just couldn't get enough air. I'mI a diver and I love to snorkeling but I like to dive down to take photos and I found it just didn't work for me
customer_reviews.author: Marcus G.

customer_reviews.title: Best for snorkeling, not fast swimming
customer_reviews.text: this mask is for slow swimming. If one swims fast one does not get enough air, I found. I think I would save it for snorkeling for it gives more air when one keeps one's head UP able to see both underwater and on top water at the same time. like one does off a boat snorkeling. It is not good for a fast swimming experience with fins. You just don't get enough air. And it is hard to keep one's head crooked upwards to get more air.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Carol Munschauer

customer_reviews.title: The small amuont of water that did get in easily drained as soon as I lifted my head out ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for me and my wife before we went to Kauai. We have snorkeled before but these masks made the entire experience much easier and more enjoyable. I have a short beard and mustache and the regular snorkel mask was always a problem, even if I put vaseline on my mustache. I trimmed my beard shor before the trip and had very little leakage.The small amuont of water that did get in easily drained as soon as I lifted my head out of the water. As others have said, these are not for diving down, but that wasn't a problem for us.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gates

customer_reviews.title: Your kids can finally snorkel!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love snorkeling but struggle so much with the traditional style mask and not being able To breathe through the nose bit that we bought one of these as a test. Game-changer!!! All of our friends are now converting and snorkeling has become fun and not tedious. We plan to buy them for ourselves ahead of our next snorkel trip and ditch the really expensive custom-fitted traditional ones we have had for the last 10 years. The youth size fits my kids (age 5 and 6) and me (mom) but I think men or medium to large headed adults should go with the bigger size. I have a pretty small head.
customer_reviews.author: ErinT

customer_reviews.title: But I have to say this is the most comfortable mask I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why I waited so long to get this mask! I was unsure about the design. But I have to say this is the most comfortable mask I have ever owned! Fits perfectly! No leaking and no fogging! Easier to breathe wearing this mask! The best thing is that the straps do not tangle in your hair! I am a female with long hair and the straps did not get caught in my hair! Seriously comfortable and the only thing I regret is waiting so long to purchase it!
customer_reviews.author: mellow

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Great investment
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for our Caribbean vacation and these are the best investment we made! We carried them all over with us to different islands and beaches and it was a great snorkeling experience! I really like that they already have the GoPro mount on them. We each attached our GoPros and got some great footage. We practiced with these once in our pool to make sure they fit. We will be using these again! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Poss

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly. No water leaks! Mask stayed fog free too! I loved the panoramic full face design. It does take a little getting use to .... the full mask felt somewhat claustrophobic until I got use to it, but after my first venture into the water that was no longer a problem! I ordered this because I did not want to put stress on the teeth restoration work I've had done by by biting on a traditional snorkel mouth piece.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable product.! If you want one go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Dinged one star (I only want to take half a star but stars can only be full or nothing) because the stitches on the upper right side on the strap came loose ang got pulled out its slot. Probably partly my fault as I made it too tight. Minor issue though because it can be restitched. Just too bad that it happened while I was on the water. Will still recommend and buy if or when I need another one.
customer_reviews.author: Rokzi

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 11 year old, now husband wants one
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old used this in the Bahamas. He loved it. The suction wasn't bad at all. It leak very little. I would give it 4.5 stars on that part because it could have also been the fault of the wearer. My son loved it so much snorkeling and had no issues breathing. I was concerned with the water leaking into the tube, but it didn't at all. Next time we go I have to get one for my husband...he was a bit jealous of his son's full face mask!
customer_reviews.author: Kpeay

customer_reviews.title: Difficulty breathing!
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to try these in Hawaii and we had so much difficulty breathing we had to get out of the water within 15 minutes. I went one way and my husband the other and we both experienced anxiety, shortness of breath and dizziness that lasted over an hour. We love to snorkel and love the water. Would not recommend these. We are off to buy the good old standby.
customer_reviews.author: Mardie Reed

customer_reviews.title: Garbage! Expensive garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe mine are defective, but i spent $69 per mask for two masks and they leak where the plastic view in the front meets the frame of the mask. Then it POOLS water by your mouth and wont drain fast enough. Terrifying.
customer_reviews.author: Quantum Apotheosis

customer_reviews.title: We were on a nice vacation in punta cana the last week
customer_reviews.text: We were on a nice vacation in punta cana the last week. We decided to go on a excursion of a snorkeling tour to see sharks and different species fish in a marine park&aquarium was very happy I was going to use my new mask.Put the mask on started to swim to the aquarium could not breathe took mask off three or four times trying to catch my breath kept mask off and needed help to boat.It took awhile to catch my breath.I think there needs to be more research on this product.Todays date is 3-23-2018
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J Ross JR

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous for ocean snorkling
customer_reviews.text: I have used this extensively my first vacation. These are well built. They are easy to use and do not leak. They are great for a a pool. Do not purchase these for ocean snorkling they are to buoyant to dive with. But really the biggest issue is if you are doing any activity that requires exertion you CAN'T BREATH. I literally think it is possible to pass out and drown using these in that type of setting.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for surface swimming.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. I use it for swimming laps, it's really good for keeping my face in the water and not needing to jerk my neck back to breathe which really helps keep my breath tempo even so I can focus more on swimming form. Haven't had any problems with it fogging up if I just spit and rinse like a regular diving mask. You cannot regulate your sinus and ear canal pressure without removing and clearing the mask, so probably not a good idea for diving down more than 2 atmospheres. I have a full beard and still get a good seal around my face with very little leakage.
customer_reviews.author: G Dubz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have had this a couple years now and it's awesome. I scuba dive but I hate snorkels. Now I don't use it to dive with but for snorkeling it's prefect. I have 0 leakage and the valve works great. When I do go under some or a wave hits it closes quickly and I get no water in. The elastic is starting to go bad so I am concerned about not getting something to replace it with. They should replace that with neoprene like regular scuba goggles.
customer_reviews.author: john grant

customer_reviews.title: Poor view and insufficient airflow.
customer_reviews.text: The lens is plastic. The view from my quality glass mask is much better. I don't get enough air from this snorkel. In my opinion, this is not something a serious snorkeler should consider.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, wonderful customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed this mask allot. It makes my swim workout a pleasure. I injured my neck and even though it is healed , my chiropractor suggested this to stop any possible irritation when I rotate my neck back and forth for a 1/2 hour. The company is fantastic as well, I had a slight problem which may have been my fault and they immediately rectified the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Scott C. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend for Comfort, No Leaking and Ease
customer_reviews.text: Mask makes snorkeling so comfortable! Nothing in my mouth and it’s so easy to breathe, I had to remind myself the mask was on. Biting down on the mouthpiece of traditional tubes was always awkward and tiring for me. This mask eliminates that piece and it seals comfortably to my face, which is average and oval shaped. I didn’t pretreat with either white toothpaste (some reviewers report scratches) or spit to prevent fogging. This mask didn’t fog at all in the open sea 45 miles from shore!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: By the 3rd use elastic was stretched all out. Had to constantly readjust to keep the salt water out of mask. Rubber around face stopped suctioning also. Could have gotten the same quality at Walmart without the expense. At least I would’ve known to expect product failure/bad fit. Hate that I missed the return window, alas my fault. I understand this isn’t the price point to expect top performance out of a snorkel/dive product- but again, could’ve spent much less at a discount store for the quality we got.
customer_reviews.author: amber purdy

customer_reviews.title: Speedy, but if you are on a vacation that can use em, WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: Wow, so much better than a standard set mask and snorkel. A little anti fog, and boom, you are good to go. While they do say it won’t fog, we noticed a little while in our local pool. A trip to Hawaii, and used them the whole time. Great views. Took a little getting used to, and they need to be rather tight to prevent water coming in. So if you have a beard or thick goatee, don’t bother IMHO. But once we got the hang of it, WAY better than average. Kids still love to use them in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed boy!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered an XS according to the size of my sons face. We ordered similar items for our other 3 kids. When he put the mask on the straps sit funny on his head. The only way to get a seal was to tighten it A LOT! It was very painful. It is very frustrating because my 6yr old had to sit and watch his 3 siblings swim under water.
customer_reviews.author: K. Carew

customer_reviews.title: This Snorkel Mask is so cool!
customer_reviews.text: This Snorkel Mask is so cool. I just got it and can't wait to use it. I've always loved to snorkel but never could figure out how to breathe correctly with other snorkels and would always end up sucking in water. This mask goes over your entire face and you don't have to have a mouthpiece in your mouth. You can just breathe normally from your nose or mouth and is made so no water can get in the mask through the snorkel. I can't wait to use it on our next vacation!
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of the older models (pink/green/blue but w/o GoPro mount) for a trip to the Galapagos. It was our first time snorkeling. Easy to learn to use. (Comes with simple directions.) The ball part of the snorkel got stuck sometimes for my sister, and she didn't like that. My snorkel worked fine and the ball never got stuck. If anything, I'm giving 5 stars for WildHorn Outfitters' superior customer service. I emailed some concerns I had about the snorkels, and they replied each time promptly (within 1 business day) and have a 100% satisfaction guarantee that they stood by. The newer panoramic models also look great, though the ones we bought had a fine viewing area.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: This is a critical element to decision making when purchasing a good mask snorkel combo
customer_reviews.text: This is for surface level or low level (2-4 feet) diving only, you cannot clear your ears for deep level diving while you have the mask on because you do not have access to plug your nose while the mask is on. The full face mask prevents the ability to plug your nose to pressururize your ears in preparation of deeper level diving. This is a critical element to decision making when purchasing a good mask snorkel combo
customer_reviews.author: pelika

customer_reviews.title: These masks are amazing. I bought two
customer_reviews.text: These masks are amazing. I bought two. The view is incredible and the fit is so much better than any other mask I've ever had. The snorkel cuts water out immediately as you go under water and there's no blowing out water when you come up. Maybe because I a large guy, the air intake seems shallow, so I have to work on controlling my breathing a little slower...maybe it's the excitement fro the view. The Go-Pro attachment is a great feature - can't wait to take it to Hawaii this summer...
customer_reviews.author: Scott M Etter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mask! However
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mask! However, if your accustomed to a standard snorkel and mask, these take some getting familiar with. Breathing, low slow and fully exhaling is a must. If you breathe too fast, you will hyperventilate and the mask will begin too tightly constrict on your face. The viewing is fantastic but these do not work as well as a traditional mask and snorkel if you intend to dip below the surface of the water to explore. I would say the comfort depth is approximately 5 feet below the surface with more pressure increasing around the face as you descend.
customer_reviews.author: antman

customer_reviews.title: better think twice
customer_reviews.text: Listen up! because if your planning on buying this you better think twice and (its not because of the brand or the way it fits) these 180 style mask really feels like your breathing through a straw. They a whole different story when your kicking around in the water, when your muscles get exhausted they need more oxygen and these mask just don't let you do that had to take of the mask and float on my back to make it back on shore.
customer_reviews.author: Meng

customer_reviews.title: Where were these when I was s kid!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Seaview with go pro attachment. Had no problems with water leakage once we figured out the right face placement and I was really happy with how easy it is to use. My entire family Loves it. People ask all the time what is is and we explain it's a full face snorkel. People comment how neat that is and often ask to try it. I'm a little protective so I don't let people try it I don't know but I do point them to places they can rent them at.
customer_reviews.author: Brea Post

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These snorkeling masks really made a difference, there was no choking on water or dealing with fogged up masks(most of the time). They seem to magnify things when you're under water which is cool but can be kind of weird because you never know how close you are to something. I would say the only downside is if you are swimming a long distance it is merely impossible to breath/take deep breaths with the mask on. My husband and I both had a problem with that but other than that tiny hiccup these are amazing and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this right away. No more biting down on a mouthpiece. easy to adjust to fit my head. Breathing was easy and I paid attention to headaches or anything unusual based on some of the feedback. I had no symptoms. I will be getting my husband this mask before our next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Cruise fanatic

customer_reviews.title: This works absolutely great either in the pool or in the ocean
customer_reviews.text: This works absolutely great either in the pool or in the ocean. In the pool the kids can use it to learn how to swim and work on their strokes without having to worry about getting water in their face. The screw provided is too short to mount a GoPro but 2 minutes with a dremmel tool or grinding wheel to remove 1/8 of the plastic and it works perfectly as seen in the attached picture. I would buy this mask again for adults or kids alike.
customer_reviews.author: B. Vincik

customer_reviews.title: I love looking at the marine life but have an instant ...
customer_reviews.text: Just finished a cruise where I used this for the first time. I was so impressed! I love looking at the marine life but have an instant panic attack everytime I get in the water with a regular snorkel and mask. This worked perfectly. No panic. I could breath naturally without fear of getting water in my mask and choking on it. I would highly recommend if you struggle with snorkeling. I'm soooo happy with it. I will be purchasing another one for my husband so he no longer has to worry about his mustache breaking the mask seal. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: cmwillms

customer_reviews.title: Snorkeling was a Breeze!
customer_reviews.text: Our family took these to the Cayman Islands and thay all loved them! We bought more when I went with them to Puerto Rico and they were a hit once again. Only downside is they must be cleaned and maintained. They are well worth it as well as the price! I would recommend them to anyone who struggles with snorkeling. It’s so much easier with these!
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: It fogged up BAD the first time I used it
customer_reviews.text: This mask did not fit well; after 30 minutes of snorkeling my upper nose would hurt from getting dug into. Im a petite woman so I ordered the medium/small. I would think the large wouldnt fit the rest of my face. It fogged up BAD the first time I used it, even after shampooing. Then it didnt fog quite so much after a couple days use. My viewscreen ended up getting scratched early after I purchased it or I would have returned it. Keep it is a protective bag when not using. Great view and keeps water out. I liked it better than a traditional mask. If it didnt hurt my nose Id give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Jay

customer_reviews.title: my experience was a lot better switching back to regular snorkel gear
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'3" 225, and I could not get enough air with this mask on unless I was very relaxed while snorkeling. I cannot get the same amount of air through this tube as I could with a regular snorkel tube. I would literally have problems getting air while moving faster. I also couldn't adjust it well enough to completely seal the face, so water would come in at the top. Basically, my experience was a lot better switching back to regular snorkel gear.
customer_reviews.author: T Howard

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing
customer_reviews.text: So much fun, super easy to use. Highly recommended. I bought these for the whole family for a vacation to Florida last summer. My 15 yr old daughter rolled her eyes at me when I pulled them out of the box. We finally convinced her to put one on after we were all having a blast with them out in the rocks just off shore. It ended up being one of our favorite memories from this vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for experienced snorklers
customer_reviews.text: I hated these and left them on tgthe beach. If you’ve snorkeled before with traditional gear, fist warning; this might not be for you. I think this is better suited to kids or adults who have never snorkeled.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: you have a view just like other goggles
customer_reviews.text: leaks. very tricky to position it not to. The 180 Degrees is simply not true. there is a ton of distortion where the plastic bends so you dont really have a 180 degree view. you have a view just like other goggles. I wish I could return it but I lost the space parts at the beach
customer_reviews.author: floridaman

customer_reviews.title: I can see
customer_reviews.text: I wear contacts, goggles and masks are just ok. This thing rocks! I use in the pool and can see perfectly. It seals great, doesn't leak. The snorkel works well and allows me to stay submerged for a long time. Took it to OCNJ this year and everybody was asking about it. New Jersey water was really too dark to see anything but that's NJ's problem. I did get it at a ridiculous sale price, the original price put it out of my range for casual pool use BUT if your a serious (snorkeler??) you might wanna try it
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: kind of scary to ue
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift, my son says it is hard to breath out of and you get a little panicked when using it. It is very different from a regular mask and snorkel. He is willing to keep trying to get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mask. Just wash it in dish soap and ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mask. Just wash it in dish soap and water when you get it, and you never have to use spit to keep it from fogging up. Was in the water for 2 straight hours and it never fogged up. The field of view is like nothing I've ever seen. You can see everything for such a wide area even without turning your head. Haven't gotten my go-pro camera to mount on top yet but the attachment for it is pretty robust and looks like it'll work great. Definitely worth the price and I'll never use a regular eye mask and snorkel again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rowlett

customer_reviews.title: Breakthrough product!
customer_reviews.text: We are on vacation in Hawaii and just had the opportunity to try the Seavirw 180 masks with snorkel. They are great! We can breathe normally while seeing a more complete view under water. Diving deep and returning to surface is easier than using a snorkel because all you do is just start breathing normally again.swimming is easier also because you don't get the side drag pulling on your mask like a traditional set up. I'm sure we sold several of these already on this trip as everyone asked about them and we let several people try them. They are great for first time snorkel ears also.
customer_reviews.author: NextBoat

customer_reviews.title: These Masks are not useable in many vacation areas
customer_reviews.text: This mask is unuseable. I took it on a trip to the Florida Keys recently and the snorkeling spots we visited would NOT let us use them due to safety issues with the full masks. I would like to return as they have never been used.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Mustin

customer_reviews.title: How to Clear the Fog!
customer_reviews.text: Two words: dish soap. In Eluthera, Bahamas, I almost gave up on these goggles because the CONSTANTLY fogged up. All the spit in the world couldn't prevent it. I got some advice from a surfer named Pete from Rebecca's Beach Shop who said to try a tiny drop of dish soap and rub that round then rinse it. Worked perfectly! Just don't get it in your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Kopec

customer_reviews.title: Best Snorkel mask ever!
customer_reviews.text: A number of us ordered these masks for an Hawaii trip for snorkeling. They work great and allow you to go under water yet breath normally in the mask and not have to keep bobbing up for air. Loved being able to get face to face with a sea turtle! Measure your face as they tell you to get the right fit. We practiced in a pool as they suggested and that helped get us ready for the open water.
customer_reviews.author: islander15

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product sold by an INCREDIBLE Company
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this mask. I can leave my contact in and no water comes in, so I don't have to worry about them getting wet or falling out. I also like that I can breath through EITHER my mouth OR my nose, whichever is more comfortable at the time. And WildHorn's Customer Service is absolutely AMAZING! They go out of their way to make sure that you are 100% satisfied. Correction, they want you to be beyond happy with your purchased. Satisfied isn't good enough for them, and they will do anything to make sure that you are. they are amazing! I would buy this mask, from WildHorn, over and over if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: cherib

customer_reviews.title: "It's no fun if your breath stinks
customer_reviews.text: We finally got a chance to try the masks in Maui over Spring Break. I will say, it does take some getting used to if you've always snorkeled using the traditional mask and snorkel tube. One bit of advice from my son....make sure you brush your teeth or have a mint before using the mask. "It's no fun if your breath stinks." HAHAHAH!!! I liked the mask and will enjoy using it again on our next trip. By the way, a woman sitting on the beach next to us came over to find out about the mask and after showing it to her, I gave her your link.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Merlo

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I'm suffocating more then I'm breathing
customer_reviews.text: The small hole on the top isn't enough for a bigger person such as myself to get a reasonable amount of oxygen to swim, I feel like I'm suffocating more then I'm breathing, I don't use this for prolonged snorkeling, and the face mask shape obscures my vision underwater making a small but noticeable refaction, maybe a rounder shape might help? The googles isn't too bad I'm definitely going to keep using it, that's just my experience with it, and it foggs up somewhat quick too, unless you buy their spray, but I don't use this for more than 20mins so there isn't a need for the spray
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even kids can use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Ten Year anniversary in Hawaii and it work great. My little five year old was able to use these to see the sea turtle. I like this mask is because we can share it among family without thinking about our mouth sucking on the mouth piece. It was easy to use just breathe normally. Also the go pro attachment worked great to record all the fishes that we see under water.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to get.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic piece of hardware. I'm glad I chose this one because it's much better quality than the previous one that I am replacing. It got moldy when I left it in the car wet. I was happy before but this one just seems better built and I can tell it will last. The gopro mount is nice, but I'm not sure I'll use it. It's nice to know also, that the Wildhorn people stand behind it, that made the decision for me to get this one over all the cheaper ones.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Siu

customer_reviews.title: Best snorkeling experience we have had!
customer_reviews.text: This was the most enjoyable time we have had snorkeling. My wife and I have the same size of mask even though my head is larger than hers (literally and figuratively). We both found the mask to be very comfortable and better designed than traditional snorkels. One of the biggest reliefs was not having so much constant pressure against my forehead. The vision is MUCH better as well that other normals masks. The most important "win" for me on this mask was that neither of us ever ended up with 1) any salt water in our mouths, 2) any saltwater leaking in, or 3) any fog that was causing us to lose vision. It is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: A whole new world with the Seaview 180 Degree Panoramic Snorkel Mask!
customer_reviews.text: This was actually a gift for our sons girlfriend in Hawaii. We had purchased one for him and he loved it, so we thought it would be nice for them both to have it when they go snorkeling. They love this product. It lives up to their expectations. No problems with it fogging up, and the view is incredible while they are snorkeling. It's easy to use, and has a nice comfortable fit. She loved this color. He has the blue/white and loves it. Satisfied customers!!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: What A Wonderful Snorkel Mask!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What A Wonderful Mask!!........I've been snorkeling for years, and have never seen anything as clever or as well built for snorkeling as this mask no more having to have that silly tube in my mouth!!.........I can breath, either thru my nose or my mouth!!.with excellent vision, not impaired in anyway!!.and a GoPro mount and hardware included with the mask!!........I highly recommend this mask to you, if your going on vacation, or to the sea shore, and want to enjoy snorkeling , in comfort, I highly recommend this terrific mask.....
customer_reviews.author: Lone Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy breathing
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my wife, she loved it. So bought one for myself, and I was surprised at how comfortable it was and how easy it was to breath. No problems with fogging as some other buyers have reported; we followed instructions to clean thoroughly and then used "Spit" anti-fog. It's possible fogging may be an issue in colder water, but if it's not over 82 degrees I'm not going in anyway. The curved lens does provide a wide angle view, but as with all wide angle lenses it makes things look farther way. It hasn't been a problem at all, just though you might want to be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: BKTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Snorkel Mask
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these for a snorkeling trip to Curacao. All worked great and family members loved them. Comfortable to wear, no leaking. Breathing is easy, no fogging, Can dive with this mask on without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: tcmturtle

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time and money...
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this mask. Have more problems with leaking and clouding up. Going to throw this in the trash as soon as my new "Old school" mask and snorkel arrive tomorrow. Was really hoping for much better at the price point I paid.
customer_reviews.author: DVP

customer_reviews.title: Great snorkels
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for a vacation in Bahamas. They packed nicely and worked great. Unfortunately, our luggage went missing on the way home and I lost both of them. 😞. They provide a great view for snorkeling. The snorkel is built right into the mask. I will consider buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: Codi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t dive with this!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, but know it’s limits. Floating around watching fish and taking pictures is excellent! 6 feet under water and you will have water works inside. No diving! Stretch out and breathe normally while floating along, a little low stress paddling, taking in the view.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Worst mask I have ever used. Extremely uncomfortable. Leaks water like crazy. Very restrictive makes it really hard to breath. You can only see what’s directly in front of you due to the flat panel of the mask. I bought 2 of these, for my wife and I and they both have the exact same issues. Obviously this company have payed for all their positive reviews. I am returning both.
customer_reviews.author: mark shafer

customer_reviews.title: Great for teenagers!
customer_reviews.text: My teen spent hours at the lake searching for fish and random treasure. They found skipping rocks, a few coins and an old toy. We ordered the S/M. I would say unless you are a very big adult male, this size is perfect. It came with a bag and is easy enough to assemble and use :) He also had fun in the pool testing it.
customer_reviews.author: tinamom1

customer_reviews.title: Ditch the traditional snorkel
customer_reviews.text: Love these masks. We use them on vacation and on the local river and lake. So much more comfortable than a typical snorkel. As a plus, if you dive down, you won't get a mouthful of water. We bought two and both have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Be careful, fraud
customer_reviews.text: p.s: This is an amendment. Previously I already complained that the product was clearly used, although it was supposed to be new. The mask was full of fine white sand. Further, the paper in the box, which had gotten wet and was crumbled, stated to remove the plastic film from the polycarbonate, but there was none. After we very carefully washed it w/o any scrubbing at all and drying it, we saw scratches on the polycarbonate. I am returning the mask and do not want a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to draw air in and out!
customer_reviews.text: I have been snorkeling most of my life and thought this may be a solution for a fogged mask. The integration of the mask and snorkel seams to make a lot of sense, but this design is hard to use. It is difficult to draw air in and out and it is difficult to seal the mask to your face. I think the idea is great, but I had to return the mask for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Craig M

product_meta.title: WildHorn Outfitters Seaview 180° GoPro Compatible Snorkel Mask- Panoramic Full Face Design. See More with Larger Viewing Area Than Traditional Masks. Prevents Gag Reflex with Tubeless Design
feature_bullets: 180° FULL FACE DESIGN- Our snorkel mask makes it easier than ever to breathe comfortably through your mouth or nose while you are snorkeling. Our mask and snorkel provide a 180° viewing area- the biggest of any snorkel mask on the market today guaranteeing that you will see more fish and sea creatures than ever before. With our integrated GoPro Mount you can easily attach your GoPro camera to capture and share your adventure with friends and family.
DRY SNORKEL TECHNOLOGY stops salt water from getting into your mouth and prevents gagging. Spend less time worrying about water in your mask and more time snorkeling!

FOG RESISTANT DESIGN- There is nothing worse than dealing with a mask that is constantly fogging up. Our innovative design features a separate breathing chamber that creates an airflow away from your main viewing visor that helps eliminates fogging and will keep you snorkeling longer.
EASY TO USE- So you spend less time fussing with equipment and more time enjoying your snorkeling experience.

PROPER USE- Full face snorkel masks are designed for leisure surface snorkeling. Serious free diving is not recommended. Strenuous swimming while wearing any type of snorkel, including full face designs, is not recommended. Be sure to take regular breaks while snorkeling. Also follow the buddy rule: never snorkel alone.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
